title: Josip Pečarić
summary: Josip Pečarić (born 2 September 1948) is a Croatian mathematician.  He is a professor of mathematics in the Faculty of Textile Technology at the University of Zagreb,[1] Croatia, and is a full member of the Croatian Academy of Sciences and Arts.[2]  He has written and co-authored over 1,200 mathematical publications. He has also published a number of works on history and politics that have been described as comprising historical negationism or Holocaust denial.
